telecom.server

Class LeakyBucketSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.Socket
      • telecom.server.LeakyBucketSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, CommandListener

    public class LeakyBucketSocket
extends java.net.Socket
implements CommandListener
    Wrapper class that encapsulates leaky bucket function into socket, activates as a worker thread.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LeakyBucketSocket(java.net.Socket socket, int bucketSize, int leakRate)
      Wraps the socket with client connection with leaky bucket functionality, with defined bucket size and leak rate.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      void onCommandReceived(RequestType type)
      Decide which traffic source to use based on the command received from client.
      void sendFromLeakyBucket()
      Send data packets from leaky bucket.
      void start()
      Starts a worker thread with specific source defined by the command from client.
      void stop()
      Stops the worker thread and receiver thread.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LeakyBucketSocket

        public LeakyBucketSocket(java.net.Socket socket,
                 int bucketSize,
                 int leakRate)
        Wraps the socket with client connection with leaky bucket functionality, with defined bucket size and leak rate. Activate receiver thread that listens to command from client.
        Parameters:
        socket - Socket with client connection
        bucketSize - Bucket size defined by the server.
        leakRate - Leak rate of leaky bucket.
